products.title: Amor Ocean Green Vertical Blind
products.description: Keep your blinds looking their best with this easy to wipe clean fabric, just use a damp cloth to wipe away any dirt or stains. This blind can be made upto 400cm wide - much wider than all other blinds on the market so that you can cover your largest window without comprimising on style. All of their blinds are sold with built-in child safety mechanisms. We adhere to the guidelines set out by the british blind and shutter association and take safety extremely seriously.

products.title: Burst Ocean Green Vertical Blind
products.description: Say aloha to this beautiful emerald blind that is even better than bobbing in a turquoise green ocean. Can a remote chain of tropical islands stop people from looking into your window? Could a the ocean, no? Well this beautiful fabric can do that with ease, and while it does so it floods the room in a beautiful greeny-teal glow that bathes the soul like the warm waters of the pacific. Combining it with other earthy colours is a sure-fire way of creating a space which heals and relaxes before you return to the stresses and distractions of real life.

products.title: Amor Electric Lime Vertical Blind
products.description: The green colour of the amor electric lime is best suited to rooms with neutral tones so as to make the most of this colour. Ideal places for this colour blind would be in the kitchen or in a child's room. As a blackout blind you this is idea for bedrooms to remove streetlight glare and early morning sunshine. Keep your blinds looking their best with this easy to wipe clean fabric, just use a damp cloth to wipe away any dirt or stains.

products.title: Kerry Lime Vertical Blind
products.description: The kerry lime is a strong, bold green colour that is one that won't go unnoticed in your window. Pair in with a neon theme to really make this blind pop. There isn't much else we can say about this colour other than how vibrant and green it is, it is a blackout fabric so would also work in a bedroom and prevent any light from passing through the fabric itself. Keep your blinds looking their best with this easy to wipe clean fabric, just use a damp cloth to wipe away any dirt or stains.
